subject: refactor: add individual colors for each tone
body:
Each of the 37 tones now has its own unique color that's a subtle
variation within its category family:

- Feeling: pink/coral/rose variations (happy=#FF7EB3, sad=#C490A8, etc.)
- Attitude: teal/cyan/mint variations (playful=#5CD9D0, serious=#5BA8A8)
- Energy: orange/gold/amber variations (calm=#E8C878, excited=#FFB060)

Category base colors preserved for header indicators via CATEGORY_COLORS.
This makes messages more visually interesting while maintaining cohesion.
